explains: v. 含混不清地说话；连奏；诽谤；有意略过（事实）；用连音线标出
n. 诽谤；吐词含糊；连奏线；污点

sentences.en: She had dared to cast a slur on his character.
sentences.cn: 她竟敢对他的人品加以诋毁。

sentences.en: This is yet another slur on the integrity of the police.
sentences.cn: 这将是对警察廉正的又一次毁谤。

sentences.en: They mumble, break all the rules of grammar, slur words and so on.
sentences.cn: 他们咕哝、打破所有语法规则、吞音等等。
